entities: ISIL (Islamic State in Iraq and the Levant)
summary:
The Security Council,

Reaffirming its previous resolutions on terrorism, 
Reaffirming the UN Charter's principles and purposes, 
Respect for states' sovereignty, territorial integrity, and unity,

 Condemns ISIL (Da'esh) terrorist attacks, 
 Determines ISIL poses a global threat to international peace and security,
 Notes Al-Nusrah Front (ANF) and Al-Qaida affiliates also threaten international peace,

Condemns ISIL's violent extremist ideology, gross human rights abuses, 
Destruction of cultural heritage, and trafficking,

Unequivocally condemns ISIL attacks in Sousse, Ankara, Sina√Ø, Beirut, and Paris,

Expresses deepest sympathy to victims and their families,

 Condemns ISIL's human rights abuses and destruction of cultural heritage,

Calls on Member States to take measures to prevent and suppress ISIL and ANF terrorist acts,

Urges intensified efforts to stem foreign terrorist fighters' flow and prevent terrorism financing,

Intends to update the 1267 committee sanctions list,

Decides to remain seized of the matter.
